sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"增加，增大"或"扩大"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: enlarge, amplify, expand, increase, magnify, multiply, augment
means: enlarge ： 主要指面积或体积等的扩大。
amplify ： 在科技中常指声音的扩大或电磁波的增强。也指补充了细节、详述或扩大内容等。此词系正式用语。
expand ： 指范围、程度、体积和尺寸等方面的扩大或增加。
increase ： 指数量、强度和大小等方面的扩大或增加。
magnify ： 可指用光学仪器使物体看上去显得变大；也指事实上把某物增大，有时用于夸张意味。
multiply ： 通常指自然繁殖而产生的增长，有时也指同类事物数量的成倍增加。
augment ： 较正式用词，一般指在原有的基础上增加含量而扩大。

sentence.Network_en: The government'sfirst concern was to augment the army and auxiliary forces.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府关心的首要问题是扩充军队及辅助队伍。

sentence.Network_en: They hit upon another idea to augment their income.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们又想出一个增加收入的办法。

sentence.Network_en: While searching for a way to augment the family income, she began making dolls.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了想法子增加家庭收入，她开始制作洋娃娃。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... auditorium n. 大礼堂 augment v. 增加，增大 aura n. 气氛；气味.
新东方考研高频词汇_百度文库 ... Attribute…to 将…归因于 augment 充实，扩充，增加，扩大 authentic 真正的，可靠的.
可以完全地取代成员函数（覆盖(override)），也可以部分地取代基类成员函数（增大(augment)）。如果愿意的话，后者由派生类成员成员函数来完成。
新东方考研高频词汇_百度文库 ... Attribute…to 将…归因于 augment 充实，扩充，增加，扩大 authentic 真正的，可靠的.

list.abs: 15、附加产品（Augmented Product）：是顾客购买有形产品时所获得的全部附加服务和利益，包括提供信贷、免费送货、售后服务 …
人类机能增进(human augmentation),尚处于技术萌芽期，据Gartner预测，这项技术10年后才会迎来高峰期。人体增进还有智慧型义肢 …
与普通隆鼻(augmentation rhinoplasty)只是从鼻孔内，以不可见的切口，局部(local anesthesia)或神经麻醉(nerve block)的情况下，置 …
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... at rest 静止 augmented matrix 增广矩阵 auxiliary angle 辅助角.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French augmenter (verb), augment (noun), or late Latin augmentare, from Latin augere 'to increase'

entry.def: To augment something means to make it larger, stronger, or more effective by adding something to it.

example.ex: While searching for a way to augment the family income, she began making dolls.
example.tran: 为了想法子增加家庭收入，她开始制作洋娃娃。

sentences.sentence: "The recent speech of the PLO chairman augmented tensions in the Near East"

auth_sentence.content: Watson uses live electronics to augment his pure-toned trumpet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Watson uses live electronics to augment his pure-toned trumpet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Watson uses live electronics to augment his pure-toned trumpet.

auth_sentence.content: Nouvel requires nothing to augment his physical presence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nouvel requires nothing to augment his physical presence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nouvel requires nothing to augment his physical presence.

auth_sentence.content: Washington decided to augment the available technical intelligence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Washington decided to augment the available technical intelligence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Washington decided to augment the available technical intelligence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: aug增加+ury→[使事态扩大]的预兆
aug增加+ust→八月为水果等丰收的结节
auct=aug增加+ion动作或状态→[价钱]扩大→拍卖
aug增加+ment→v.[使]增大,增加,增长,扩张

Sentence.sentence: My colleagues and I are studying something called augmented reality (a field of computer research dealing with the combination of real-world and virtual reality)," said Christopher Dede, professor in learning technologies at Harvard University, "Alien Contact," for example, is an exercise developed for middle-school students who use hand-held devices that can determine their location.

means.word_mean: 增加, 提高, 扩大

sentences.en: He augments his income by teaching in the evening.
sentences.cn: 他通过晚上教书来增加收入。

jushi.english: The sound of traffic augments during the morning rush hour.
jushi.chinese: 一到早晨高峰时刻,交通噪音就加大。

jushi.english: The report recommends the use of private resources to augment government services in some areas.
jushi.chinese: 这份报告建议利用私人资金来增加某些地方公共设施的经费。

jushi.english: New York City draws water from the Hudson River to augment reservoirs when they are low.
jushi.chinese: 当水库的水位低时,纽约市从哈德逊河引水来增加储水量。
